page.title: 04Greenlands Farm
page.content: {Greenlands Farm}is situated on heavy clay soils at the foot of the Wolds. The farmer rents 450 acres and owns 75.The farm is mainly arable and this year the crop acreages are:220 winter wheat,85 winter barley,40 broad beans 25 sugar beet,45 rape.These crops are his main source of income.Farming is an expensive business and he has to make Â£200 per acre to break even.These crops are managed by 4 family workers and a fleet of machines including 5 tractors and a combine harvester. Fertilisers like nitrogen and sprays to control pests and diseases help to give high crop yields.He also grows 8 acres of oats for the cattle.There are 120 Lincoln Red beef cattle and 1 Limousin bull.He breeds and grows the cattle which he takes to market when they are about four months old.All the farms in this area are similar.
